comments.creator: jh@junetz.de
comments.author: jh@junetz.de
comments.text:
If you try to import attachment 573561 from bug 701432 on Windows (using hg qimport bz://701432 and choosing 1), all line ends end up as LF instead of mixed CRLF/LF. As a consequence, the patch cannot be applied. Everything is fine on Linux.

Windows setup: Win7 x64 with MozillaBuild 1.5.1 (hg 1.5.4) and wget 1.12 from Cygwin
Linux setup: Kubuntu Oneiric with hg 1.9.1 and wget 1.12
comments.raw_text:
If you try to import attachment 573561 from bug 701432 on Windows (using hg qimport bz://701432 and choosing 1), all line ends end up as LF instead of mixed CRLF/LF. As a consequence, the patch cannot be applied. Everything is fine on Linux.

Windows setup: Win7 x64 with MozillaBuild 1.5.1 (hg 1.5.4) and wget 1.12 from Cygwin
Linux setup: Kubuntu Oneiric with hg 1.9.1 and wget 1.12
